name: Legacy of the Chosen Ones Who Must Use Their Superpowers To Survive The Dungeon Crawl All The Way To the Top of the...
name_original: Legacy of the Chosen Ones Who Must Use Their Superpowers To Survive The Dungeon Crawl All The Way To the Top of the...
description:
Full Title:  Legacy of the Chosen Ones Who Must Use Their Superpowers To Survive The Dungeon Crawl All The Way To the Top of the Celestial Tower Where Paradise and Eternal Glory Await, But To Succeed They Must Face the Mighty, All-Powerful Dark Lord and His Four Lords of the Elements

Assemble a party of 4 randos and climb to the top of the Great Tower.  This ultra-short jam version features only a single town and a single tower floor, however.  That's what I get for starting with only a week left I suppose.
